# ic-stepper

This is a wrapper component to be placed around one or more ic-step components

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                        | Type                     | Default        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | -------------- |
| `aligned`        | `aligned`         | The alignment of the stepper within its container.                                 | `"full-width" \| "left"` | `"full-width"` |
| `connectorWidth` | `connector-width` | The length of the connnector between each step in pixels. Minimum length is 100px. | `number`                 | `100`          |


----------------------------------------------
